column4: How do i install the source of the kernel and all of it's modules?  I have linux-image-`uname -r` installed but it is missing the mac80211 source
for source, install the *-dev package.  So, linux-image-`uname -r`-dev
that doesn't work with the kernel
oh, duh, running on autopilot, it's the -headers isn't it??
